Name: Responsables De Linda Vista Group
description:
Brenda is 24 years old. She began to work in agriculture six years ago, raising principally coffee and basic grains. She did this work when she left her parents' [home] to form her own family. After she separated from her husband, she acquired a job as a teacher, and the salary covered her agricultural expenses. She has 2 manzanas [about 3.5 acres] of coffee that she inherited.

She is again applying to FUNDENUSE for a loan with Kiva funds to buy compost and foliar treatments to maintain her coffee crop.

With the previous loan, she was able to obtain very good production in her harvests because of the opportune application of the supplies.

Her goal is to build her own house and buy lands for planting coffee and expand her property.

She belongs to the solidarity group "Responsables de linda vista" along with Keylin and Jos√©, who also work in agriculture.
